alert.note: Alert for Kenosha; Milwaukee; Racine; Waukesha (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 20 at 1:35AM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Milwaukee, Racine, eastern Waukesha and Kenosha Counties through 230 AM CDT... At 135 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Pewaukee to near Franklin to Lake Bluff. Movement was north at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Milwaukee, Kenosha, Racine, Waukesha, West Allis, Wauwatosa, New Berlin, Brookfield, Greenfield, Menomonee Falls, Oak Creek, Mount Pleasant, Muskego, South Milwaukee, Pleasant Prairie, Cudahy, Whitefish Bay, Greendale, Pewaukee and Brown Deer. People attending Irish Fest in Milwaukee , Oak Creek Farmers Market , The Bristol Renaissance Faire , and The Greenfield Family Campout should seek safe shelter immediately! MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
